allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: DataFlow - Clay.com Clone

Features implemented:
- Next.js 14+ with App Router and TypeScript
- TailwindCSS with glassmorphism design system
- SQLite database with Drizzle ORM
- Project management with folder/workbook hierarchy
- Spreadsheet interface with virtual scrolling
- CSV import/export functionality
- Filtering and sorting system
- Google Vertex AI integration for data enrichment
- Enrichment configuration panel with custom prompts

Components:
- Glass UI components (Button, Input, Card, Modal, etc.)
- Animated background with floating orbs
- Context menu and dropdown menus
- Toast notifications
- Sidebar with project tree
- Spreadsheet with resizable columns

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash("C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Cloud SDK\google-cloud-sdk\bin\gcloud.cmd" auth application-default login --no-launch-browser)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Formula Builder, enhanced filtering, and enrichment improvements

Features:
- Formula Builder system with JavaScript/Lodash/FormulaJS support
- AI-powered formula generation using Gemini 2.5 Pro
- Click formula column header to edit existing formulas
- Enhanced filter system with column-specific dropdowns
- Row display range controls \(show first N rows\)
- Column visibility toggle
- Enrichment data viewer with datapoint extraction
- Retry failed enrichment cells
- Optimize prompt with AI assistance
- API settings modal for configuration
- Service account support for Vertex AI \(no re-auth needed\)

New components:
- FormulaPanel - Formula builder sidebar
- AddFilterButton - Quick filter creation
- ColumnFilterDropdown - Per-column filter controls
- ColumnVisibilityDropdown - Show/hide columns
- RowDisplayControl - Limit displayed rows
- EnrichmentDataViewer - View structured enrichment data
- APISettingsModal - Configure API keys

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Turso cloud database support for production

- Add @libsql/client for Turso connection
- Update db/index.ts to support both local SQLite and Turso
- Add init-turso.ts script for database initialization
- Update .env.local.example with Turso config

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
